title: BucketMetadata

BucketListType.description:
BucketListType is an XDR Enum defines as:

```text enum BucketListType { LIVE = 0, HOT_ARCHIVE = 1 }; ```

BucketMetadataExt.description:
BucketMetadataExt is an XDR NestedUnion defines as:

```text union switch (int v) { case 0: void; case 1: BucketListType bucketListType; } ```
